title: Northeastern United States
summary: The Northeastern United States (also referred to as the American Northeast, the Northeast, and the East Coast) is a geographical region of the United States.  On the Atlantic coast of North America, Canada is to its North, the Southern United States is to its south, and to its west is the Midwestern United States. The Northeast is one of the four regions defined by the United States Census Bureau for the collection and analysis of statistics.[1]
